013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
022
023/**
024 * Holds a set of reusable objects for different aspects of the OpenAPI Specification.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * The Components Object holds a set of reusable objects that can be referenced from other parts of the API specification.
028 * This promotes reusability and reduces duplication by allowing common schemas, responses, parameters, and other objects
029 * to be defined once and referenced multiple times using the <c>$ref</c> syntax.
030 *
031 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
032 * <p>
033 * The Components Object is composed of the following fields:
034 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
035 *    <li><c>schemas</c> (map of {@link SchemaInfo}) - Reusable schema definitions
036 *    <li><c>responses</c> (map of {@link Response}) - Reusable response definitions
037 *    <li><c>parameters</c> (map of {@link Parameter}) - Reusable parameter definitions
038 *    <li><c>examples</c> (map of {@link Example}) - Reusable example definitions
039 *    <li><c>requestBodies</c> (map of {@link RequestBodyInfo}) - Reusable request body definitions
040 *    <li><c>headers</c> (map of {@link HeaderInfo}) - Reusable header definitions
041 *    <li><c>securitySchemes</c> (map of {@link SecuritySchemeInfo}) - Reusable security scheme definitions
042 *    <li><c>links</c> (map of {@link Link}) - Reusable link definitions
043 *    <li><c>callbacks</c> (map of {@link Callback}) - Reusable callback definitions
044 * </ul>
045 *
046 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
047 * <p class='bjava'>
048 *    <jc>// Create a Components object with reusable schemas</jc>
049 *    Components <jv>components</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Components()
050 *       .setSchemas(
051 *          JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
052 *             <js>"Pet"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo()
053 *                .setType(<js>"object"</js>)
054 *                .setRequired(<js>"id"</js>, <js>"name"</js>)
055 *                .setProperties(
056 *                   JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
057 *                      <js>"id"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"integer"</js>),
058 *                      <js>"name"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>)
059 *                   )
060 *                ),
061 *             <js>"Error"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo()
062 *                .setType(<js>"object"</js>)
063 *                .setProperties(
064 *                   JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
065 *                      <js>"code"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"integer"</js>),
066 *                      <js>"message"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>)
067 *                   )
068 *                )
069 *          )
070 *       );
071 *    <jc>// These schemas can then be referenced: "#/components/schemas/Pet"</jc>
072 * </p>
073 *
074 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
075 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#components-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Components Object</a>
076 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/components/">OpenAPI Components</a>
077 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
078 * </ul>
079 */
080public class Components extends OpenApiElement {
081
082   private Map<String,SchemaInfo> schemas;
083   private Map<String,Response> responses;
084   private Map<String,Parameter> parameters;
085   private Map<String,Example> examples;
086   private Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> requestBodies;
087   private Map<String,HeaderInfo> headers;
088   private Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> securitySchemes;
089   private Map<String,Link> links;
090   private Map<String,Callback> callbacks;
091
092   /**
093    * Default constructor.
094    */
095   public Components() {}
096
097   /**
098    * Copy constructor.
099    *
100    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
101    */
102   public Components(Components copyFrom) {
103      super(copyFrom);
104      this.schemas = copyOf(copyFrom.schemas);
105      this.responses = copyOf(copyFrom.responses);
106      this.parameters = copyOf(copyFrom.parameters);
107      this.examples = copyOf(copyFrom.examples);
108      this.requestBodies = copyOf(copyFrom.requestBodies);
109      this.headers = copyOf(copyFrom.headers);
110      this.securitySchemes = copyOf(copyFrom.securitySchemes);
111      this.links = copyOf(copyFrom.links);
112      this.callbacks = copyOf(copyFrom.callbacks);
113   }
114
115   /**
116    * Returns the schemas map.
117    *
118    * @return The schemas map.
119    */
120   public Map<String,SchemaInfo> getSchemas() {
121      return schemas;
122   }
123
124   /**
125    * Sets the schemas map.
126    *
127    * @param value The new value for this property.
128    * @return This object.
129    */
130   public Components setSchemas(Map<String,SchemaInfo> value) {
131      this.schemas = value;
132      return this;
133   }
134
135   /**
136    * Returns the responses map.
137    *
138    * @return The responses map.
139    */
140   public Map<String,Response> getResponses() {
141      return responses;
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * Sets the responses map.
146    *
147    * @param value The new value for this property.
148    * @return This object.
149    */
150   public Components setResponses(Map<String,Response> value) {
151      this.responses = value;
152      return this;
153   }
154
155   /**
156    * Returns the parameters map.
157    *
158    * @return The parameters map.
159    */
160   public Map<String,Parameter> getParameters() {
161      return parameters;
162   }
163
164   /**
165    * Sets the parameters map.
166    *
167    * @param value The new value for this property.
168    * @return This object.
169    */
170   public Components setParameters(Map<String,Parameter> value) {
171      this.parameters = value;
172      return this;
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Returns the examples map.
177    *
178    * @return The examples map.
179    */
180   public Map<String,Example> getExamples() {
181      return examples;
182   }
183
184   /**
185    * Sets the examples map.
186    *
187    * @param value The new value for this property.
188    * @return This object.
189    */
190   public Components setExamples(Map<String,Example> value) {
191      this.examples = value;
192      return this;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Returns the request bodies map.
197    *
198    * @return The request bodies map.
199    */
200   public Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> getRequestBodies() {
201      return requestBodies;
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Sets the request bodies map.
206    *
207    * @param value The new value for this property.
208    * @return This object.
209    */
210   public Components setRequestBodies(Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> value) {
211      this.requestBodies = value;
212      return this;
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Returns the headers map.
217    *
218    * @return The headers map.
219    */
220   public Map<String,HeaderInfo> getHeaders() {
221      return headers;
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Sets the headers map.
226    *
227    * @param value The new value for this property.
228    * @return This object.
229    */
230   public Components setHeaders(Map<String,HeaderInfo> value) {
231      this.headers = value;
232      return this;
233   }
234
235   /**
236    * Returns the security schemes map.
237    *
238    * @return The security schemes map.
239    */
240   public Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> getSecuritySchemes() {
241      return securitySchemes;
242   }
243
244   /**
245    * Sets the security schemes map.
246    *
247    * @param value The new value for this property.
248    * @return This object.
249    */
250   public Components setSecuritySchemes(Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> value) {
251      this.securitySchemes = value;
252      return this;
253   }
254
255   /**
256    * Returns the links map.
257    *
258    * @return The links map.
259    */
260   public Map<String,Link> getLinks() {
261      return links;
262   }
263
264   /**
265    * Sets the links map.
266    *
267    * @param value The new value for this property.
268    * @return This object.
269    */
270   public Components setLinks(Map<String,Link> value) {
271      this.links = value;
272      return this;
273   }
274
275   /**
276    * Returns the callbacks map.
277    *
278    * @return The callbacks map.
279    */
280   public Map<String,Callback> getCallbacks() {
281      return callbacks;
282   }
283
284   /**
285    * Sets the callbacks map.
286    *
287    * @param value The new value for this property.
288    * @return This object.
289    */
290   public Components setCallbacks(Map<String,Callback> value) {
291      this.callbacks = value;
292      return this;
293   }
294
295   /**
296    * Creates a copy of this object.
297    *
298    * @return A copy of this object.
299    */
300   public Components copy() {
301      return new Components(this);
302   }
303
304   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
305   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
306      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
307      return switch (property) {
308         case "schemas" -> toType(getSchemas(), type);
309         case "responses" -> toType(getResponses(), type);
310         case "parameters" -> toType(getParameters(), type);
311         case "examples" -> toType(getExamples(), type);
312         case "requestBodies" -> toType(getRequestBodies(), type);
313         case "headers" -> toType(getHeaders(), type);
314         case "securitySchemes" -> toType(getSecuritySchemes(), type);
315         case "links" -> toType(getLinks(), type);
316         case "callbacks" -> toType(getCallbacks(), type);
317         default -> super.get(property, type);
318      };
319   }
320
321   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
322   public Components set(String property, Object value) {
323      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
324      return switch (property) {
325         case "callbacks" -> setCallbacks(mapBuilder(String.class, Callback.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
326         case "examples" -> setExamples(mapBuilder(String.class, Example.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
327         case "headers" -> setHeaders(mapBuilder(String.class, HeaderInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
328         case "links" -> setLinks(mapBuilder(String.class, Link.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
329         case "parameters" -> setParameters(mapBuilder(String.class, Parameter.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
330         case "requestBodies" -> setRequestBodies(mapBuilder(String.class, RequestBodyInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
331         case "responses" -> setResponses(mapBuilder(String.class, Response.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
332         case "schemas" -> setSchemas(mapBuilder(String.class, SchemaInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
333         case "securitySchemes" -> setSecuritySchemes(mapBuilder(String.class, SecuritySchemeInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
334         default -> {
335            super.set(property, value);
336            yield this;
337         }
338      };
339   }
340
341   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
342   public Set<String> keySet() {
343      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
344         .addIf(callbacks != null, "callbacks")
345         .addIf(examples != null, "examples")
346         .addIf(headers != null, "headers")
347         .addIf(links != null, "links")
348         .addIf(parameters != null, "parameters")
349         .addIf(requestBodies != null, "requestBodies")
350         .addIf(responses != null, "responses")
351         .addIf(schemas != null, "schemas")
352         .addIf(securitySchemes != null, "securitySchemes")
353         .build();
354      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
355   }
356
357   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
358   public Components strict() {
359      super.strict();
360      return this;
361   }
362
363   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
364   public Components strict(Object value) {
365      super.strict(value);
366      return this;
367   }
368}
